page.title: 06Services in Westhill.
page.content: Westhill has a very limited range of {services}.This is because it is very near the{City of Aberdeen}which has a much more variad and extesive service sector. The services which are available in Westhill include a small branch of the Royal Bank of Scotland.This is the only bank in the community .There is also the firm of Storie Cruden & Simpson which combines the role of both estate agents and solicitors.The Halifax and the Abbey National building societies both have a small branch in Westhill. The firm of Holmes O'Carrol provide engineering services, whilst Liam Findlay are a firm of local architects. Advice on pensions, investments etc,is provided by the Save and Prosper Group.
